title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

description.en:
Aki Uchiyama, the writer who led the "bishojo" (beautiful girl) and "lolicon boom" in adult magazines, brought the flavor of his works published in adult magazines directly to boys' magazines in this extremely problematic work. Although the story is styled as a science fiction fantasy comedy about a pretty elementary school girl named Tsukasa, who is a test subject for strange inventions. She is made to wear underwear, diapers, and half-naked clothes, not to mention all the tricks she's played on. Perverse and erotic expressions are the main themes of the works. The author, Aki Uchiyama, also published an adult-oriented self-parody work, "Ankoro-Trio," at about the same time as this work.

While originally published as shonen, later prints are labeled for adults because the contents was considered harmful. [+18 don't tag as shonen]

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

altTitles.ja: 愛がなければアイドルできない

altTitles.en: Without Love, I Can't Be an Idol

description.en: SeishunScans: Noa Kuroda worships Ibuki, a member of the super popular idol group ILY, as a god. After ILY's concert, Noa happens to run into Ibuki at a convenience store. When Noa learns that Ibuki is stressed out from being worshiped as a "god" and "charismatic" by his fans, she unconsciously hides the fact that she is an otaku, but...

altTitles.ja: わたしの恋のはじめかた

description.en:
I want to see the look on Senpai's face when she falls in love.'' 
Chisaki, a reality dating show geek, has formed many couples in her daily life and because of this, everyone calls her Machiapu Senpai (MatchApp-senpai). She had given up on her love life, but Reo-kun, her popular and good-looking kouhai, somehow became emotionally attached to her! While supporting Reo-kun’s friend's love journey, she decides to rehabilitate her own love life with Reo-kun too?!
Alcohol, skipping class, accidental groping... College student life is the best! Four men and women who belong to the photo club of the university in a fluffy comedy!
description.ja:
大学生たちは今日も授業に出ず、部室で酒を飲んでいた。そこになぜか高校の制服を着て、四条ゆきが現れる。ゆきは制服のままビールを飲もうとするが、ビールを福岡夏美にぶちまけ、夏美はブラ透けしてしまう。夏美は泣く泣く、ゆきが持ってきた中学の制服を着るはめになってしまった。

「ヘイ!　写真部ボーイズ。ひとつお願いあんだけど」

description.en: Hirose Itsuki is a high school girl who is afraid of getting hurt. One day, Hino, a celebrity at school who quit basketball because of an injury, asks her, "Do you know any good ways to pass the time?" Hino asks her if she knows of any good ways to pass the time, and they end up studying together. Itsuki then gradually becomes aware of Hino. A pure love story of a medical student begins!

Middle school brawler Noboru Haitani has never lost a fight. But the bitter taste of a soccer defeat gradually warms him up to the sport, until one day Haitani finds himself in a match against a team featuring middle school soccer prodigy Takami. An outlaw fights his way into the world of soccer!

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

title.en: The Dragon Cubs Arrive! Mommy is a Dragon

altTitles.en: The Dragon Cub Is Coming! Mommy Is Fierce And Spicy

altTitles.vi: Lóng Zǎi Lái Xí! Mā Mī Hěn Yòu Là

description.en: Five years ago, she left an egg and said, "This is the son I gave birth to you. When he grows up, that will be my return date." A few months later, the son broke out of the shell, with two shiny eggs on his head. Xiao Longjiao, she hadn't returned at te date. She disappeared for five years, and he went crazy for five years, until the little dragon cub brought back a woman... But the little dragon cub said, "Dad, she saved me, and I want to commit myself to her!" Infighting.

title.en: Memoir of the God of War

altTitles.en: Memoir of the King of War

description.en:
Breathing does not guarantee everyone’s alive! Dan Sa Yu, a descendant of Goryeo, greatly reprimands the Central District for the sake of his friend whom he treasures the most. He reigns every battle! No one could stop him! Cheonpo Armed Forces. The greatest martial arts of Goryeo! The legend of Cheonpo Armed Forces lives on while the history of the King of War unfolds!

---
* [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047611)
* [Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80868)
* [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1laU4XdlpNc)
description.ja:
息をしているからといって、生きているわけではない！ 高麗の子孫である単砂流（たんさりゅう）、彼は大切な友人のために中原を駆け抜ける。 彼は戦の支配者！誰も彼を止めることはできない！ 天砲武将類（てんほうぶしょうるい）、それは高麗の偉大なる武功！ 天砲武将類の伝説は永久で、戦王の壮大な歴史が幕を開く！

---
* [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047611)
* [Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80868)
* [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1laU4XdlpNc)
description.ko:
숨을 쉰다고 해서 모두가 살아있는 것은 아니다!

고려의 후예 단사유, 가장 소중한 친구를 위해 중원을 질타하다.
그는 전투에서 군림하는 자! 누구도 그를 막을 수 없다!

천포무장류. 위대한 고려의 절대 무공!
천포무장류의 전설은 영원하고, 전왕(戰王)의 위대한 역사가 펼쳐진다!

---
* [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047611)
* [Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80868)
* [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1laU4XdlpNc)
description.ru:
То, что ты жив, покажет не стук твоего сердца! Дан Саю, потомок Горё, которому нет равных в бою, решил отплатить сполна Чон Вону за своего дорогого друга. Никто его не остановит! Чхонпо наращивает боевую мощь. Полная безнаказанность, которую нельзя оставить без внимания! Легенды о боевых искусствах Чхонпо будут жить вечно, а великому сказанию о бывшем короле лишь предстоит начаться!

---
* [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047611)
* [Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80868)
* [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1laU4XdlpNc)

description.en:
I, Leticia Violet, was devoted to my husband, but I lost everything. Just as she is about to lose her life, a man appears in her life. He promises to help me achieve the perfect revenge...

"When you say you'll help me get my revenge... please honor your word."

To those who brought me to my death, I will give back all that I have received.

---
When Letitia Winchester faces death at the hands of her husband’s mistress, fate intervenes. She’s fished out of the river by Prince Sion, the first “Sol” born in a holy empire in 300 years. Using his divine powers, he changes Letitia’s appearance and gives her the new identity of Countess Anarose Victoire. Armed with divine powers and a thirst for revenge, the two form an unlikely alliance. Prince Sion seeks justice for a fallen friend, while Letitia plots retribution against those who wronged her.

Together, they embark on a journey of vengeance and redemption.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

description.en:
A miraculous story that saves the world with the power of "stone"!

A mysterious power resides in the crystal possessed by Akira Amachi, a boy who is knowledgeable about stones. Using that power, Akira decides to solve various cases!     The first episode is about a train derailment! ? A train traveling at breakneck speed heads towards the collapsed railway bridge... Will Akira be able to save the people on the train??　
Akira's miraculous story begins now!!!

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Shimotsuki-san wa Mobu ga Suki ~Hitomishiri na Kanojo wa Ore ni Dake Dere Amai~

altTitles.ja: 霜月さんはモブが好き～人見知りな彼女は俺にだけデレ甘い～

altTitles.en: Shimotsuki-san Likes the Mob: This Shy Girl is Only Sweet Towards Me

altTitles.vi: Shimotsuki-san chỉ thích nhân vật nền

altTitles.th: นิยาย ตัว (ไม่) ประกอบของคุณชิโมสึกิ เล่ม

altTitles.zh: 霜月同学喜欢上路人角色

altTitles.id: Shimotsuki-san Menyukai Mob ~Gadis Pemalu Ini Hanya Terlihat Manis di Hadapanku~

altTitles.en: She Is In Love with the Mob

altTitles.pl: Shimotsuki-san Lubi Postać Poboczną: Ta Nieśmiała Dziewczyna jest Urocza Tylko Wobec Mnie

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng Shimotsuki trót phải lòng nhân vật nền

description.en:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!
description.id: Sepulang sekolah, Nakayama Koutarou kembali ke sekolah untuk mengambil sesuatu yang lupa dia bawa, di dalam kelas dia bertemu Shimotsuki Shiho yang terlelap. Katanya, Shiho ini ditaksir sama Ryuuzaki Ryouma, pria populer membentuk harem di kelas, namun dia tampak selalu datar dan tak ada yang pernah melihatnya tersenyum. Karena suatu kejadian mereka berdua berpegangan tangan dan memulai “hubungan rahasia” antara heroin dan mob.
description.ja:
『例えばもし、この世界が＜物語＞だとするならば主人公は一体誰になるのだろう――。』

高校入学式当日、義妹・親友・幼馴染の3人の少女に『サヨナラ』を告げられた中山幸太郎は、一人孤独な高校生活をスタートさせる。自分は誰の人生においても取るに足らない存在、『モブ』であることを明確に認識した幸太郎だったが、ある日の放課後、幸太郎は誰もいない教室で眠りこける霜月しほに遭遇する。クラスでハーレムを形成中のモテ男・竜崎龍馬の大本命だが、いつも無表情でクールと噂の彼女。その彼女が幸太郎の手を握り、満面の笑顔でこう言った。「わたしとお友達になってくれる？」

『この物語の主人公は俺ではない。そう思っていた。あの日までは――。』
description.pl:
Tylko ty jesteś wyjątkowy.

Po lekcjach Koutarou Nakayama wraca do szkoły, by zabrać coś, czego zapomniał i znajduje Shiho Shimotsuki śpiącą w pustej klasie. Mówi się, że Shiho podkochuje się w Ryoumie Ryuuzakim, popularnym chłopaku, który założył harem w swojej klasie, ale ona zawsze jest bez wyrazu i nikt nigdy nie widział jej uśmiechu.

Ale teraz, trzyma rękę Koutarou...?! Rozpoczyna się „sekretny związek” między bohaterką a postacią poboczną!
description.pt-br: Depois da escola, Kotaro Nakayama retorna à escola para pegar algo que esqueceu e encontra Shiho Shimotsuki dormindo em uma sala de aula vazia. Há rumores de que Shiho é a paixão de Ryoma Ryuuzaki, um garoto popular que formou um harém em sua classe, mas ela é sempre inexpressiva e ninguém nunca a viu sorrindo. Mas agora, ela está segurando a mão de Kotaro…?! A “relação secreta” entre a heroína e o figurante começa!

description.en:
Wen Ming unexpectedly transmigrates into a high-martial world and finds himself engaged to the powerful Empress, Wu Xin. Hoping to take advantage of this connection for a comfortable life, he plans to rely on her and avoid hardship. However, his dream of an easy life is quickly shattered after he unintentionally angers Wu Xin.

Uncertain about her own feelings for him, Wu Xin devises a test—she sends her close friend, Tao Sisi, to seduce Wen Ming. This not only serves as a trial of his loyalty but also helps her gauge whether she would feel jealous. As Wen Ming navigates this unusual predicament, he questions the effectiveness of such a test, wondering what kind of man would actually fail in such a situation.
description.zh: 文明意外穿越到高武世界，并与女帝武心负有婚约，本想抱大腿吃软饭躺平一生，但却因惹恼女帝计划泡汤。 而女帝武心不确定自己是否真的喜欢男主，竟派闺蜜陶思思去勾引文明，考验文明的同时看看自己是否会因此吃醋。 文明：你就拿这个考验干部？哪个干部经不起这样的考验？

description.en: The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where "a maid sells jewels". Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.
description.ja: 宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。きらめく宝石を手にしたとき、彼らの人生もまた輝きだす。

altTitles.en: Ended Up Living with a Classmate

altTitles.ja-ro: Classmate to Issho ni Sumu Koto ni Natte shimatta

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトと一緒に住むことになってしまった

altTitles.ru: В итоге пришлось жить с одноклассницей

description.en: It's a collection of short manga stories about interacting with a girl, sometimes romantically and sometimes not.
description.ru: Это сборник коротких историй о взаимодействии с девушкой, романтических и не только

description.en: Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?

I was living a life of a NEET, and I was supposed to have died suddenly because of my daily indolence - but when I woke up, I had become a baby. It seems that I was reincarnated in another world where magic exists. I was born the son of a lord in a remote village, and began to lead a second life with my beautiful mother Kara, my big-breasted maid and nanny Ruina, and my beautiful sister Amelia, who is not related to me by blood. As a teenager, I've grown up and enjoy my daily life in a different world using my top-level magical ability and modern knowledge...?
description.ja: ニート生活を送っていた俺は、日頃の不摂生が祟り突然死したはずだった――が、目覚めたら赤ちゃんになっていた。どうやら魔法の存在する異世界に転生したらしい。辺境の村の領主の息子として生まれた俺は、美しい母親のカーラ、巨乳のメイド兼乳母ルイーナ、血の繋がらない美人妹アメリアらに囲まれて第二の人生を歩んでいく。成長した俺は、10代にして異世界トップレベルの魔力量と現代知識を駆使して、異世界での日常を楽しむが……!?
description.pt-br: Eu estava vivendo uma vida de NEET e deveria ter morrido de repente por causa de minha indolência diária - mas quando acordei, havia me tornado um bebê. Parece que reencarnei em outro mundo onde existe magia. Nasci filho de um senhor em uma aldeia remota e comecei a levar uma segunda vida com minha linda mãe Kara, minha empregada de seios grandes e babá Ruina, e minha linda irmã Amelia, que não é parente de mim. Como um adolescente, eu cresci e aproveitei minha vida diária em um mundo diferente usando minha habilidade mágica de nível superior e conhecimento moderno...?

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en: Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10,000 meters in the sky to invade Earth! The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety! The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest...?
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ja: 人類の守護者・竜神戦隊ドラゴンキーパーVS.世界征服を企む悪の軍団・怪人。彼らは互いの存亡を懸け、死闘を繰り広げ続けている！！……というのは、やらせの茶番劇。他の星から侵略してきた怪人達は、わずか１年で屈服。民衆の前で敗北を演じ続ける道化と化していた！悪者にすらなれず、隷従させられ続ける日々。そんな状況を覆すべく、一人の怪人が最強の大戦隊を相手に反旗を翻す！
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

altTitles.en: Goblin Slayer! Side Story: Year One

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝：イヤーワン

altTitles.zh-hk: 哥布林殺手外傳：第一年

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Diệt Yêu Tinh: Năm Thứ Nhất
Dũng Sĩ Diệt Yêu Tinh: Năm Thứ Nhất

description.en: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.
description.pl:
Prequel ujawniający przeszłość Goblin Slayer'a i wydarzenia, które doprowadziły go do zostania poszukiwaczem przygód, któremu przyświeca wyłącznie jeden cel: eksterminacja wszystkich goblinów. ~M  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentosakaeda)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.ganganonline.com/contents/goblinyo/)  
- [Official LN (EN)](https://yenpress.com/series-search/?series=yen346-goblin-slayer-side-story-year-one-light-novel)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma série de prequel que revela o passado de Goblin Slayer e os eventos que o levaram a se tornar um aventureiro com o único propósito de exterminar todos os goblins do mundo.
description.ru: События манги перенесут нас на 5 лет назад, в то время, когда Убийца Гоблинов только закончил свои тренировки и расстался с мастером. Манга поведает нам о том, чем занимался Убийца Гоблинов все эти 5 лет до встречи с Жрицей.
description.vi: Tiền truyện tiết lộ quá khứ của Kẻ Diệt Yêu Tinh và những sự kiện đã đưa anh trở thành một nhà thám hiểm với mục tiêu duy nhất là tiêu diệt toàn bộ yêu tinh trên thế giới

description.en:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.

altTitles.ja: ツギハギだらけの最強勇者

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi hagi Darake no Saikyou Yuusha

description.en: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.
description.ja: 【異世界×グロ×バトル】　転生先は、まさかのゾンビ！？　勇者ゾンビとして魔王討伐の旅に出るも、《力》の使用には《代償》が必要で…？　異世界系ダークファンタジー

altTitles.en: The Monster Duchess and the Contract Princess
The Monster Duchess and the Contract Lady
The Monster Duchess and Contract Princess

altTitles.pt: A duquesa monstruosa e a princesa de contrato

altTitles.vi: Bản Khế Ước Với Nữ Công Tước Ác Ma
Nữ công tước quái vật và công chúa hợp đồng

altTitles.fr: La duchesse monstrueuse et la dame du contract
La duchesse monstrueuse et la princesse par contrat

altTitles.es: La duquesa monstruosa y la princesa del contrato

altTitles.uk: Княгиня чудовиськ та принцеса за контрактом

altTitles.ru: Княгиня чудовищ и принцесса по контракту

altTitles.fa: داچس هیولا مانند و شاهزادهی قراردادی

altTitles.th: ดัชเชสปีศาจกับพันธสัญญาบุตรสาว

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

title.en: Houkago, Boku wa Kimi ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 放課後、ぼくは君になる

description.en: Akiba, a high school boy who has become addicted to cross-dressing cosplay, devotes himself to emulating his "oshi." Then one day, while he was dressed up as his favorite character, all alone in the club room, he is found out by Shibuya, a gorgeous gal that he has a crush on...? This is the start of a secret relationship between these two polar opposites! They will apply their youthful enthusiasm to a life of "oshi promotion"!
description.ja: コスプレ沼にハマった高校生・秋葉はひとりぼっちで推し活に励んでいた。そんな中、こっそり部室で推しのコスプレをしていたら、憧れていた顔面天才な美女ギャル・渋谷さんに見られてしまい…!?

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

description.en: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!
description.pt-br: À beira da morte, o guerreiro mais forte da humanidade, Ang, misteriosamente reencarna sessenta anos no futuro com a força do “Demônio mais Forte” — uma espada perigosa de dois gumes. Para resolver suas queixas e revelar a verdade, Ang não tem escolha a não ser “evoluir” continuamente em uma tentativa de fuga de seu destino passado. “Não vou deixar que eu me torne um demônio! Se quero sair, preciso confiar em mim mesmo!”

altTitles.ja: 再婚承認を要求します

description.en:
Navier was the perfect Empress and a masterful administrator and regent for the empire; however, she and the Emperor were not lovers, and the Emperor wanted a wife, not a colleague. And so, he sought a concubine and placed a secretly ambitious slave girl beside him. That was fine, as she was willing to allow him his concubine of choice… until Navier heard the Emperor promised the slave girl the Empress' position. After much agonizing, Navier decided to marry the king of the neighboring kingdom.  
  
A popular web novel adapted to webtoon.  


---
description.ru: Навье была идеальной императрицей, однако императору нужна была жена, а не коллега. И вот император оставил императрицу Навье и взял в наложницы рабыню Рашту. Всё было прекрасно, пока Навье не услышала, как император пообещал рабыне место императрицы. После долгих мучений Навье решила, что она снова выйдет замуж.

title.en: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 女キャラで異世界転移してチートっぽいけど雑魚キャラなので目立たず平和な庶民を目指します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Chara de Isekai Ten'i shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin o Mezashimasu!

altTitles.en: After Reincarnating in Another World as My Sort of Cheat but Small Fry Female Character I will Strive to Live a Peaceful Life of an Ordinary Person!

altTitles.hu: Olyan Női Karakterként Kerülök Egy Másik Világba, Akinek Ugyan Vannak Különleges Képességei, De Mivel Egy Jelentéktelen Karakter Vagyok, Megpróbálok Nem Feltűnni És Békés Hétköznapi Életet Élni!

description.en: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
description.es: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.hu:
Egy kimerült irodai dolgozó. Egy nap, amikor felébred, azt veszi észre, hogy egy másik világba került, és abban a női karakterben van, amelyet az általa játszott online játékban használt, Suzy néven. Bár kezdetben össze van zavarodva, támadásai hatalmas pusztító erővel bírnak, olyannyira, hogy még a hegyek alakját is megváltoztatja, és veszélyes vadállatokat űz a közeli faluba. Miközben segít Howardnak, a falusiak védelmezőjének, a vadállatok elleni küzdelemben, meghívást kap a faluba. Azonban...

Egy 32 éves férfi... egy online játék világában lánnyá válva próbál boldogulni!? Célja egy egyszerű, békés élet megteremtése a falusi környezetben. A kaland most kezdődik!
description.ja:
お疲れ気味のサラリーマン。ある日、目が覚めると...やりこんでいたネットゲームの女キャラ・スージィの姿で異世界転移していた。とまどいながらも攻撃を放つと...なぜか山の形を変えてしまうほどの破壊力で、人里のほうに魔獣を散らしてしまう。そしてその対処をしていた護民官ハワードを助けたことをきっかけに、村に招かれることになるのだが――。

32歳のおっさんが...ネトゲの世界で女の子として生きていく!? 目指せ庶民派スローライフ、開幕!!
description.vi: Một anh nhân viên làm công ăn lương bình thường.  Bỗng một ngày nọ, sau khi tỉnh dậy… anh thấy mình ở một thế giới khác trong cơ thể của một nhân vật nữ, Susie, trong game MMORPG mà anh rất thích. Bối rối, Anh đấm hết lũ quái xung quanh… và khiến tất cả quái vật chạy trốn đến nơi con người sinh sống trong sự sợ hãi trước sức mạnh hủy diệt có thể đập nát cả một ngọn núi của mình. Xử lý xong đám quái vật, anh cứu giúp ông bác Howard đang bị lũ quái bao vậy, Howard ngỏ lời mời anh đến làng, thế rồi...
description.es-la: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.pt-br: Um assalariado um pouco cansado. Um dia, ao acordar… ele se viu em outro mundo no corpo de uma personagem feminina, Susie, do MMORPG que ele gostava de jogar. Confuso, ele tentou um ataque… e fez todos os monstros fugirem para o lugar onde as pessoas vivem, com medo de seu poder avassalador que é capaz de destruir uma montanha. Depois disso, ele acabou salvando Howard, um tribuno local que convidou seu salvador para a vila, mas…

description.en: In modern Japan, where "vampires" that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as the "Madara-sou," a unit notorious for being full of "troublemakers." Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly "dangerous," even among the eccentric residents of Madara-sou.
description.ja: 人に擬態し、人を喰う「吸血鬼」が跋扈する現代日本。ヤツらを狩るため、銀武器片手に人知れず戦う少女たちがいた！駆除業者の中でも問題児が集まった部隊・即応六班――通称「まだら荘」。吸血鬼を引き寄せる「ごちそう」体質を持ち、人を遠ざけ生きてきた昴 玲央がそこで出会ったのは、まだら荘の中でも一際美しく一際ヤバイ女・紀里谷 開花でーー。

description.en: The major power of the Evillious region, the Kingdom of Lucifenia. Ruling this vast country was the 14-year-old princess, Riliane. She used her absolute power to squeeze everything from the people, and anyone who defied her was beheaded without mercy.

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

The story follows a young Karate practitioner named Tsukumo Mutsu, 40th master of the deadly Mutsu Enmei Ryu style.

---
- **Won the 14th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1990**

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BF%AE%E7%BE%85%E3%81%AE%E9%96%80)

In her desire to find the perfect evil man to be her slave, the devil Eclair travelled all the way from the netherworld to a local country town's police station. And she set her sights on the evil looking cop, Kuwahara Daichi.

Eclair wants to do everything to tame Daichi, and Daichi wants to drive her back to hell.

What a romantic battle... or that's what it looks like. Actually Eclair is completely useless and Daichi can't let her be alone.

title.en: Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku

altTitles.ja: デスマーチからはじまる異世界狂想曲

altTitles.en: Death March to the Parallel World Rhapsody

altTitles.zh: 从死亡之旅开始的异世界狂想曲

altTitles.ru: Марш смерти в рапсодию параллельного мирa

altTitles.th: โศกนาฏกรรมต่างโลกเริ่มต้นจากเดธมาร์ช

description.en: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.
description.ja: デスマーチ真っ只中のプログラマー、”サトゥー”こと鈴木。仮眠を取っていたはずの彼は、気がつけば見たこともない異世界に放り出され、そして目の前には蜥蜴人の大軍？
description.vi:
Suzuki, một lập trình viên trưởng thành, sau khi thức dậy đột nhiên nhận ra rằng cậu bị triệu hồi vào 1 thế giới khác khi đang mặc một bộ quần áo bình thường ở cấp độ 1. Cậu đạt được cấp độ cao và kho báu sau khi sử dụng phép thuật-sẵn-có-3 lần, Mưa Thiên Thạch, chỉ với một lần và lên cấp thánh . Sau đó việc cậu dự định làm ở thế giới khác là một “chuyến du hành tham thú ngắm cảnh”?
Gặp gỡ ba cô gái người thú, hai chị em gái xinh đẹp với mái tóc tím & đen cùng một cô gái yêu tinh tóc vàng kì dị và với rất nhiều người trên chuyến du hành của cậu sau này xuất hiện rồi gia nhập dàn HAREM. Dù phải chiến đấu với ma quái và chúa quỷ, đây vẫn là câu chuyện viễn tưởng ấm áp xúc động.
description.pt-br: Suzuki Ichirou é um programado de 29 anos que subitamente fora levado a um mundo diferente, trajando apenas roupas comum e no level 1. Ele obteve um nível elevado e inúmeros tesouros após utilizar 3 vezes uma habilidade descartável, [Meteor Shower], chuva de meteoros. Após superar essa crise, ele decidiu realizar um "Turismo em outro mundo? Superando adversidades, fazendo amigos, obtendo companheiros, ocasionalmente derrotando demônios, lordes demônios e pessoas mal-intencionadas, Satou aproveita o seu dia-a-dia nesta calorosa história de fantasia.

altTitles.ja: 織田ちゃんと明智くん

description.ja:
本能寺の変から４４２年ーーなんやかんやあって、付き合いました。

学園一の不良・明智隆之介と、学園のアイドル・織田麻里亜。想い合う二人の前世は、かつて裏切り裏切られた明智光秀（と織田信長だった！ 記憶が戻ったことで、再び明智を支配下においた織田は、カップルを装いつつ現世での天下統一を目指すことに…！？
description.es-la: Akechi Ryunosuke, el chico más rebelde de la escuela, y Oda Maria, la idol más querida, jamás imaginaron que sus mundos opuestos podrían unirse. Sin embargo, después de que Akechi confiesa sus sentimientos, comienzan una inesperada relación. Pero durante su primer beso, un impactante recuerdo del incendio del Templo Honnouji invade sus mentes... ¡Comienza así una electrizante vida escolar, donde el amor y el rencor de vidas pasadas se mezclan en una historia apasionante y llena de misterio!

altTitles.ja: レンタルアンドロイドの話。

description.en: A man finds housework consuming his spare time, but cannot afford to buy an android, so he goes to an Android Rental Agency to rent one to handle his chores for him. But all is not as it seems.

title.en: I Am the Youngest Daughter of Murim’s Strongest, the Namgung Clan

altTitles.en: Youngest Daughter of the Ultimate Martial Master Namgung Family

description.en:
"B-baa, baaah?! (Did I become a baby?! What about my revenge?!)
Everyone in the Namgung family despised me. My life was one where even my siblings turned their backs on me.
But at the moment when the family was annihilated, the choice my siblings made… was not the family, but me.

‘I never once thought of you as anything but family.’
‘Live. Even if it’s disgraceful and filthy, live, Ahee.’

Why did they save me?
A question I held in my heart my entire life as I carried out my revenge.
I thought I could finally close my eyes at the end of it all.

‘Baaah?’

I’ve returned to the past!
Could this be some black magic from the Blood Cult?
My… my revenge? My peaceful rest?!
And why are the Namgung siblings clinging to me again?!

What on earth is going on?!"

The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School, but their name lets on much more, as they are being influenced by strange occult forces.
Dan Hayato, a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past, arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body, what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?
description.ja: 帝高校夜間部のアイドル、氷河めぐみが、謎の老婆ミス・ヴァージン率いる黒門高校によって拉致された！彼女を救うために教師が招いたのは、檀隼人という謎の転校生。めぐみ奪還に動き出す隼人だったが、その役目は我らにこそあり、と帝高護衛団「烈鬼」も動き出す。果たして彼女を救いだすのは――？

description.en:
The original story which the popular manga series Horimiya is based on.  
  
It's said that youth is bittersweet, but maybe it's just bitter? Kyoko Hori is a flashy high school girl, who, despite her ostentatious appearance, excels in academics and loves her family. Izumi Miyamura is a bland high school boy, who, regardless of not wanting to stand out in class, secretly wears piercings outside of school and has a large body tattoo. One day, Miyamura finds Hori's little brother injured and helps him back to Hori's house, where the relationship between Hori and Miyamura begins with Hori's discovery of Miyamura's secret, and his of her's.  
  


---
description.ru:
В школе Хори-сан – пример для всех – красивая, дружелюбная девушка с высокой успеваемостью, но это лишь одна её сторона, другую – она тщательно скрывает. Её родителей-трудоголиков часто не бывает дома, так что Хори вынуждена всё своё свободное время посвящать домашним делам и присмотру за младшим братом.  
Миямура-кун кажется одноклассникам мрачным отаку в очках, однако на самом деле он очень вежливый и спокойный человек, и ему трудно даётся учёба. Миямура не любит выделяться, так что усердно скрывает, что у него есть пирсинг и татуировки.  
Однажды случай сводит их вместе за пределами школы. Хори едва узнаёт в нём своего одноклассника, а Миямура поражён тем, насколько она отличается от того образа, что поддерживает в школе. Теперь им двоим есть с кем поделиться своими тайнами и раскрыть настоящих себя.  
  


---

Chapters 1 - 140 are the main story.  
Chapters 141 onwards are extras.

description.en:
Jo Eun, a high school student from Busan suffering from amnesia, believes he was an outcast in the past. He transfers to a school in Seoul.

Determined not to be ostracized again, Jo Eun tries to get along with his classmates and gradually adapts to his new school life.

The problem arises when he is paired with Seo Beom! Jo Eun is instantly drawn to her at first sight. However, Seo Bom is the designated outcast chosen by the school's king, Hwang Dae-han.

His classmates warn him that associating with Seo Beom will lead to Jo Eun being ostracized as well. Yet, despite his intentions, Jo Eun's heart keeps gravitating toward Seo Beom.

altTitles.ja: ヘブンバーンズレッド公式４コマ

description.en: A humorous 4-koma series about the daily activities of the Seraph Squadron that helps us to know a bit more about their personalities and outlook on life.
description.vi: Loạt manga 4 khung tranh về sinh hoạt thường nhật của các chiến binh Quân đoàn Seraph theo phong cách đáng yêu và hài hước, giúp ta biết thêm một phần về tính cách và quan điểm sống của họ.
